node.html: As prolonged sedentary behavior causes early mortality, there has been increasing interest in active workstations, which allow workers to simultaneously perform both office tasks and physical activities; but, it is unknown how office workers actually use in real world. This research is the first attempt to reveal user experiences for active workstations.
